restaurant counter attendant job - REGINA - TACO DEL MAR
restaurant counter attendant (Expired) TACO DEL MAR REGINA Job Order Details restaurant counter attendant Print This Job Email a Friend Information en fran??ais Job Order #: 5083721 Employer Name: TACO DEL MAR Posted Date: 04/18/2010 Location: REGINA # of Positions: 1 Employment Terms: Full/Part Time Experience: No Experience Apply By: 04/25/2010 How to Apply?: Online or in person to 1101D Kramer Blvd Apply for this job online now! Description Taco Del Mar is looking for a person to fill the following shifts Friday 7:30PM to 4:00AM Saturday and Sunday 5PM to 11PM as well as more hours are available for the right person. Apply in person at Taco Del Mar 1101D Kramer Blvd or online. This position is to start training immediately. Skills and Abilities Work Setting - Fast food Essential Skills - Oral communication Counter Attendant and Food Preparer Skills - Prepare, heat and finish simple food items - Package take-out food - Portion and wrap foods - Take customers' orders Kitchen Helping Skills - Clean and sanitize kitchen including work surfaces, cupboards, storage areas, appliances and equipment Type of Equipment - Cash register Credentials (certificates, licences, memberships, courses, etc.) - Not required Application Information.... Found at Saskjobs.ca on 2010-04-18 18:09:02
